subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Ron Hextall, an All-Star goaltender and the most valuable player of the 1987 Stanley Cup finals, has severed his long association with the Philadelphia Flyers to become assistant general manager of the Los Angeles Kings. Hextall will also serve as the general manager of the American Hockey League's Manchester Monarchs, the Kings' primary minor league affiliate.
